%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%     DOCUMENT STYLES
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\geometry{
    a4paper,
    left=22mm,
    right=22mm,
    top=25mm,
    bottom=30mm,
    headheight=12.7pt,
    heightrounded
}
\usemintedstyle{github}

% line height
\linespread{1.2}
% rozostup medzi odsekmi
\setlength{\parskip}{0.8em}

% Spacing before/after should be a little bit bigger
\titlespacing*{\section} {0pt}{3.5ex plus 1ex minus .2ex}{3.3ex plus .2ex}
\titlespacing*{\subsection} {0pt}{3.25ex plus 1ex minus .2ex}{2.5ex plus .2ex}

% format title
\titleformat{\chapter}[block]
{\normalfont\huge\bfseries}{\thechapter}{20pt}{\Huge}

% format section
\titleformat{\section}
{\normalfont\fontsize{20}{20}\bfseries}{\thesection}{1em}{}

% format subsection
\titleformat{\subsection}
{\normalfont\fontsize{17}{13}\bfseries}{\thesubsection}{1em}{}

\newcommand{\step}[1]{%
	% format step's subsection
	\titleformat{\subsection}
	{\normalfont\fontsize{14}{10}\bfseries}{\thesubsection}{1em}{}
	% add step subsection
    \subsection*{#1}
	% format subsection back to its normal look
	\titleformat{\subsection}
	{\normalfont\fontsize{17}{13}\bfseries}{\thesubsection}{1em}{}
}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%     STYLES FOR ADMONITIONS
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\colorlet{notecolor}{blue!85!red}
\newtcolorbox{note}[1]{
	leftrule=1mm,
	toprule=0mm,
	rightrule=0mm,
	bottomrule=0mm,
	arc=0mm,
	enlarge top initially by=5mm,
	enlarge bottom finally by=5mm,
	title={#1 },
	coltitle=notecolor,
	colback=white,
	colframe=notecolor,
	detach title,
	before upper={\textbf{\tcbtitle}},
}

\colorlet{warningcolor}{yellow!70!black}
\newtcolorbox{warning}[1]{
	leftrule=1mm,
	toprule=0mm,
	rightrule=0mm,
	bottomrule=0mm,
	arc=0mm,
	enlarge top initially by=5mm,
	enlarge bottom finally by=5mm,
	title={#1 },
	coltitle=warningcolor,
	colback=white,
	colframe=warningcolor,
	detach title,
	before upper={\textbf{\tcbtitle}},
}
